comment: If they are a religion, and not a semitic race, as many uninformed people claim, then, it is impossible for anyone who criticizes Israel and jews to be anti-semitic. If they are a religion, and not a race? I am merely exercising my right to free speech - and, freedom of religion - by declaring my opposition to their religion.

                  :ARG1 ii
                  :ARG2 (a4 / and
                        :op1 (s / speak-01

                        :op2 (f2 / free-04

                  :ARG1 o
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ARG1 r6))
      :mod (m2 / mere)
